Articles.Content: Hi! I made Intake O'rocket(Missile Rocket with Exploding Intake) and please show me how do i post a download on ad .fly or something with permanent links.... at me destroys.... a small base with low crash tolerance parts!!!
Mediafire.com is a pretty easy-to-use file sharing site. Upload something there, and it creates links you can include in your posts.
Thanks! But I am working in progress.. i need in every evening to do my homework i have only a hour, so i'm making a stable rocket
